executable.title: Segment Tube Seeds (TubeTK)
executable.description: Given an image and foreground and background masks, computes multiscale Jet (0, 1, and 2 order) features at each pixel, performs a multivariate discriminant analysis for separating the classes, and generates the LDA/PCA instances of the images.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

image.name: outputSeedScaleImage
image.label: Scale of seeds
image.description: Image that contains the chosen seed scale at each voxel.

image.name: labelMap
image.label: Train Label Map
image.description: Label map that designates the object of interest.

integer.name: tubeId
integer.description: ID to be used in label map to designate tubes.
integer.label: Label map value for tubes

integer.name: backgroundId
integer.description: ID of things that are not tubes in the label map
integer.label: Label map value for background

integer.name: unknownId
integer.description: ID used in label map to designed unlabeled points.
integer.label: Label map value for unlabeled points

double-vector.name: ridgeScales
double-vector.label: Ridge Scales
double-vector.description: Scales at which Ridge features are computed.

double.name: seedTolerance
double.label: Seed tolerance
double.description: Tradeoff between sensitivity and specificity (higher value = more seeds)

file.name: saveTubeSeedInfo
file.description: Save tube seed information to a file.
file.label: Save vessel seed information

file.name: loadTubeSeedInfo
file.description: Load vessel seed information from a file
file.label: Load vessel seed information

string.name: saveFeatureImages
string.description: Base filename for saving feature images.
string.label: Feature images base filename
